scripts.minifyCSS: cleancss -b --batch-suffix '.min' front/*/*.css !front/*/*.min.css && cleancss -b --batch-suffix '.min' front/Components/*/*.css !front/Components/*/*.min.css && cleancss -b --batch-suffix '.min' front/Pages/*/*.css !front/Pages/*/*.min.css
scripts.build: npm run generateJS && npm run minifyCSS
